Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Stuart's 1904 recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Balanced and complex, heavier than Bamboo recipes with dry vermouth.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Thomas Stuart's 1904 Stuart's Fancy Drinks and How to mix them . Bamboo Cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo Cocktail (Stuart's 1904 recipe) contains 97 calories
